meanings.definition: Stated or estimated as likely to happen in the future.
meanings.sent1: The weather forecast predicted a sunny day tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: The predicted outcome of the experiment was accurate.
meanings.sent3: The predicted arrival of aliens caused excitement in the town.
meanings.sent4: Her predicted success in the competition surprised everyone.
meanings.sent5: The predicted storm approached with dark clouds looming overhead.

meanings.sent1: The predicted snowfall led to school closures.
meanings.sent2: His predicted absence from the meeting was concerning.
meanings.sent3: The predicted rise in prices made everyone rush to buy groceries.
meanings.sent4: The predicted traffic jam turned out to be a nightmare.
meanings.sent5: The predicted earthquake sent tremors through the city.
